title: Thanks  Riot for dynamic queue and champion select
body:
I just wanted to say thank you for the changes. I think its a positive step. I think having some control over your role will encourage more people to play ranked. I think dynamic queue achieves a better vision for how the game is supposed to be played, as a team. As a new player i found it confusing that there was a solo queue in a team game that was emphasized. 

Bottom line as humans we hate change. But i think people will slowly come around to the idea. I know for my other 2 friends and i summoners rift has become more appealing since we can now group together.

replies.body:
I hate playing not. This makes it so much better.

In game I can tell my allies that I like playing "top/mid/jg" and sometimes we switch lanes.  No fighting.
